1C-1.name: 1C 1
description: 1C 1 refers to the first year of Centhris during and following the First Convergence.

Age of the Elemental Lords: In 1C 1, the Fire Convergence begins, as Centhris and the Elemental Planes intersect in cosmic alignment. Elementals freely walk the Material Plane without need for planar gates.

1C-6752.name: 1C 6752
description: The following historical events took place in 1C 6752:

Banishment of Akad: The wizards Menodora & Amabilis banish Akad the Magnificent from the Material Plane, barring his reentry through any interplanar rift.

minor: The wizards Menodora & Amabilis banish Akad the Magnificent from the Material Plane.

1C-6500.name: 1C 6500
description: The following historical events took place in 1C 6500:

The Age of Giants Begins: With the slow decline of the influence of the Elemental Lords, Giants begin to take control of large swaths of Centhris.

1C-7400.name: 1C 7400
description: The following historical events took place in 1C 7400:

Era of the Primulus Tempus Draconis: The era known as the Primulus Tempus Draconis begins around this time.

1C-8209.name: 1C 8209
description: The following historical events took place in 1C 8209:

End of an Age: The final year of the Era known as the First Convergence. The next year in historical record is referred to as 2C 1, or the first year of the Second Convergence.

era: The final year of the Era known as the First Convergence.

2C-1.name: 2C 1
description: 2C 1 refers to the first year of Centhris during and following the Second Convergence, an event which lasted roughly 12 years. The following historical events took place in 2C 1:

Arrival of the Eladrin: In 2C 1, the first Eladrin stepped foot on Centhris from the realms of the Feywild.

2C-12.name: 2C 12
description: The following historical events took place in 2C 12:

Convergence Ends: In 2C 12, the Second Convergence comes to a close with the Feywild returning to its natural existence as a mirror plane of the material world.

2C-80.name: 2C 80
description: The following historical events took place in 2C 80:

Founding of the Utharian Empire: The Utharian Empire is founded under the guidance of eldarin from the Feywild, the humans of Thyra and the tieflings of Koraxon.

2C-110.name: 2C 110
description: The following historical events took place in 2C 110:

Era of the Primulus Tempus Draconis: The age known as the Primulus Tempus Draconis ends around this time, due to the aggressive hunting and extermination of dragons by the various great empires of the early Second Convergence.

age: End of the Primulus Tempus Draconis.

2C-694.name: 2C 694
description: The following historical events took place in 2C 694:

Foundation of the Vessuna Alcimianus: Castra Dialanum founds the Vessuna Alcimianus, a research center for the study of the arcane and its potential to perfect the physical form. After the Ruination of Centhris, this area would come to be known as the Twisting Warrens.

2C-837.name: 2C 837
description: The following historical events took place in 2C 837:

the Ruination of Centhris: The Utharian Empire ends with the cataclysm which would become known as the Ruination of Centhris.

Heskur: Sorceror-King Erèdin Esk Zarlaya, Grand Magister of the Utharian Empire, enters the Aelsonthar and ascends to godhood as the Stygian.
The Ruination of Centhris begins, causing the complete destruction of the Utharian Empire and widespread devastation across the entire globe.

2C-900.name: 2C 900
description: The following historical events took place in 2C 900:

Cordus Tempus Draconis Begins: The Era of Centhris history known as the Cordus Tempus Draconis begins roughly around this time. With the fall of the existing humanoid civilizations due to the Ruination, dragons become the preeminent power on the prime material plane.

2C-1412.name: 2C 1412
description: The following historical events took place in 2C 1412:

Muntae Dynasty is Founded: The Muntae Dynasty of Namjeon is founded. The Muntae, a mysterious foreign family from lands beyond Western Koraxon, arrive with a small force of elite soldiers and mages. Within three years, the Muntae control the entire Namjeon Peninsula.

2C-1975.name: 2C 1975
description: The following historical events took place in 2C 1975:

Shulxaa, the Withered King, Comes to Pow: After years of undermining the ruling nobles of the Kingdom of Istagen, the lich lord Shulxaa assumes full control of the kingdom. No longer hiding behind proxies or agents, the lich assumes the throne, having removed all actors capable of challenging him.

major: The Lich Lord Shulxaa comes to power in Istagen.

2C-2047.name: 2C 2047
description: The following historical events took place in 2C 2047:

Dusvar: The Zelmar Law is official enacted in the free city of Zelmar. The city would go on to be a model for other city governments throughout Ulfwyst.

minor: Zelmar Law is official enacted in the free city of Zelmar.

2C-2062.name: 2C 2062
description: The following historical events took place in 2C 2062:

The Great Clan War of Lemuria Begins: The Great Clan War begins in Lemuria due to long-standing clan rivalries. The inciting event was a domestic dispute between Clan Arnbjorg and Clan Tordenfødt.

2C-2100.name: 2C 2100
description: The following historical events took place in 2C 2100:

Tempus Draconis Ends: The Era of Centhris history known as the Tempus Draconis ends roughly around this time. As humanoid kingdoms begin to reemerge and challenge the power of the tyrannical chromatic dragons, the power of the dragonkin begins to wain.

2C-2103.name: 2C 2103
description: The following historical events took place in 2C 2103:

The Great Clan War of Lemuria Ends: The Great Clan War ends with the Treaty of Kilurus, which declares the city under the control of the Clan Council of Lemuria. The treat also established the elected position of High King or Queen, which served as a central, unifying figurehead behind which the Lemurians could rally.

2C-2143.name: 2C 2143
description: The following historical events took place in 2C 2143:

Nylwis: The Congress of Adendorf takes place at Castle Adendorf near the city of Korasov. Resulting in the founding of the @+Malstein Confederation+@.

major: The Congress of Adendorf occurs in Ulfwyst resulting in the foundation of the Malstein Confederation.

2C-2191.name: 2C 2191
description: The following historical events took place in 2C 2191:

Rise of the Xiong Dynasty: After a quarter century of instability, the Liao family founds the Xiong dynasty begins in the Kingdom of Daotian.

era: The Xiong dynasty begins in the Kingdom of Daotian.

2C-2209.name: 2C 2209
description: The following historical events took place in 2C 2209:

Savage Contagion: The @+Savage Contagion+@ was a widespread outbreak of lycanthropy across eastern Ulfwyst. Perpetuated by a heretical cult of Sage that venerated the more savage elements of the natural world, the cult managed to infect hundreds of people across several kingdoms before it could be contained.

major: The Savage Contagion, a widespread outbreak of lycanthropy, devastates eastern Ulfwyst.

2C-2211.name: 2C 2211
description: The following historical events took place in 2C 2211:

Heskur: The War of Five Crowns between begins.

war: The War of Five Crowns begins.

2C-2245.name: 2C 2245
description: The following historical events took place in 2C 2245:

Gonsaar: The War of Five Crowns between ends.

war: The War of Five Crowns ends.

2C-2250.name: 2C 2250
description: The following historical events took place in 2C 2250:

Wars of Dominion: The era known as the Wars of Dominion roughly begins around this date, though no exact date is generally accepted.

2C-2440.name: 2C 2440
description: The following historical events took place in 2C 2440:

Wars of Dominion: The era known as the Wars of Dominion is considered to come to an end around this date, with the Navolinian Subjugation of Malstein taking place in 2438.

age: The Wars of Dominion come to a close.

2C-2461.name: 2C 2461
description: The following historical events took place in 2C 2C 2461:

Heskur: The Knights of the Sacred Dawn defeat Shulxaa, the Withered King, and destroy his phylactery. After the defeat of the lich lord, the knights form the Theocracy of Tovanis from the ashes of the Kingdom of Istagen.

major: The Knights of the Sacred Dawn defeat Shulxaa, the Withered King and form the Theocracy of Tovanis.

2C-2467.name: 2C 2467
description: The following historical events took place in 2C 2C 2467:

Gonsaar: The Muntae Dynasty was overthrown in Namjeon. The era of the Three Kingdoms of Namjeon begins, as the Baeshu, Jung and Hyoba families vie for control of the once unified kingdom.

major: The Muntae Dynasty was overthrown in Namjeon.

2C-2481.name: 2C 2481
description: The following historical events took place in 2C 2481:

Jeden: The War of Red Claws, or @*the First War of Zurastian Aggression*@, begins with the Zurastian demand of the formal annexation of the Lepkar Peninsula from Lemuria.
Dusvar: The War of Red Claws ends with Treaty of Lepkar. Zurast formally declares itself an Archduchy.

war: The War of Red Claws occurs in Ulfwyst.

2C-2536.name: 2C 2536
description: The following historical events took place in 2C 2536:

Unvar: The Navolinian Conquest of Azond begins.

war: The Navolinian Conquest of Azond begins.

2C-2541.name: 2C 2541
description: The following historical events took place in 2C 2541:

??: Erlinder Bluefield & Evan-Jakob Reinhold are born.

minor: Erlinder Bluefield & Evan-Jakob Reinhold are born.

2C-2542.name: 2C 2542
description: The following historical events took place in 2C 2542:

Heskur: The Ruby Drifters defeat Usodgen, the Scourger, at Kaer Edsken in Lemuria.

minor: The Ruby Drifters defeat Usodgen, the Scourger, at Kaer Edsken in Lemuria.

2C-2543.name: 2C 2543
description: The following historical events took place in 2C 2543:

Heskur: The Navolinian Conquest of Azond ends.

war: The Navolinian Conquest of Azond ends.

2C-2546.name: 2C 2546
description: The following historical events took place in 2C 2546:

Tarnia: A massive riot, which turned into a full scale prison break, occurs at Duskreef Citadel. After the riot, the prisoners took control of the island, and turned the surrounding village into a pirate haven.

minor: A prison riot at Duskreef Citadel results in the surrounding island becoming a pirate haven.

2C-2549.name: 2C 2549
description: The following historical events took place in 2C 2549:

2C-2551.name: 2C 2551
description: The following historical events took place in 2C 2551:

Singor: The War of Sellswords begins between the Archduchy Zurast and the Kingdom of Lemuria.

2C-2554.name: 2C 2554
description: The following historical events took place in 2C 2554:

Nylwis: The War of Sellswords ends with the Archduchy of Zurast annexing territory from the Kingdom of Lemuria.

2C-2552.name: 2C 2552
description: The following historical events took place in 2C 2552:

Ebosk: The War of Black Fields, also known as the @*3rd Navolinian War of Expansion*@, between the Kingdom of Navolin, the Theocracy of Tovanis and the Kingdom of Sedobia begins.

war: The War of Black Fields begins.

2C-2555.name: 2C 2555
description: The following historical events took place in 2C 2555:

Mythosk: The War of Black Fields, also known as the @*3rd Navolinian War of Expansion*@, between the Kingdom of Navolin, the Theocracy of Tovanis and the Kingdom of Sedobia ends with the Treaty of Tarona. @;The treaty results in the Kingdom of Navolin formally absorbing the eastern half of Sedobia into its territory and Tovanis annexing the western half of Sedobia.;@

war: The War of Black Fields ends.

2C-2573.name: 2C 2573
description: The following historical events took place in 2C 2573:

Ebosk: The Lost Shields form in the village of Rythlon, Navolin.
Prince Aronas of Navolin is assassinated.

minor: The Lost Shields form in the village of Rythlon, Navolin.
